item.title: Use Git Tags to Trigger a Webhook in AWS CodeBuild
item.description: AWS CodeBuild has nice integration with different git service providers(like GitHub, BitBucket etc). Even integrating webhooks is pretty easy. It triggers for every push, pull, when PR is created, when PR is merged etc. But it can be bit tricky when it comes to trigger for every tag push. Here is how I implemented in step by step.
